settings.title: Get your game on and get your snack on: Introducing the QuadCast AF
settings.description_col_1: We all know just how easy it is to forget to grab a bite to eat while playing your favorite games. Designed with the modern gamer in mind, the QuadCast AF is the perfect all-in-one solution for streamers, content creators, and gaming enthusiasts. Whether you're streaming to your squad, or vibing with your friends for hours, the QuadCast AF has got you covered.

settings.desc: Equipped with a built-in air fryer, this revolutionary device allows you to enjoy your favourite snacks without ever leaving your gaming setup. Simply place your food inside the hexagonal chamber, for HyperX Hex Heating, and with just a tap of your finger, you can continue gaming while you wait for your mini pizzas, bagel bites, and more. Although... if it detects pineapples on your pizza, the mic automatically turns off!

Featuring a sleek and compact design, and the functionality of an air fryer, the QuadCast AF delivers crystal-clear audio quality, ensuring that your voice is heard loud and clear, so you can cook in game, and IRL. Grab your own QuadCast AF, which is now available on the HyperX website. Don't miss your chance to revolutionize your gaming setup with the QuadCast AF: Tap to cook!

Today, OMEN unveils the epitome of luxury gaming technology: the OMEN 24K. Crafted with the finest 24K gold, this masterpiece combines opulence with unparalleled performance set to redefine the gaming experience. This laptop really says: “all that glitter is gold.”*
